projects.name: CoupSwap
projects.description: Developed CoupSwap which Transformed unused coupons into profitable assets online. Increased coupon redemption rates by 60% and drove significant financial growth. Led the creation of an innovative coupon trading platform, demonstrating strong entrepreneurial skills. Achieved a 45% increase in user satisfaction and expanded market reach by 50%.

projects.name: CineGuru
projects.description: Revamped CineGuru website using Vue.js and TypeScript, integrating a custom API that enhanced user experience by providing detailed movie and series information, and increased average session duration by 25%. Enhanced performance and user engagement by optimizing the API, resulting in a 30% increase in data retrieval speed and a 25% boost in user interaction compared to the previous version.

experiences.description: Spearheaded the development of the Vishnu Paradise web app, enhancing user experience with intuitive room browsing, comprehensive descriptions, and efficient booking management. Implemented advanced features for real-time updates, secure authentication, and streamlined booking processes, resulting in a 30% reduction in administrative workload.

Mastered LaTeX and R Programming under Dr. Nirbhay Mathur, significantly improving technical proficiency. This led to a 15% reduction in report preparation time and a 25% improvement in data visualization quality. Facilitated Entrepreneurship training with Dr. Vijanth, enhancing communication and collaboration. Achieved a 25% increase in resume score growth and a 40% boost in team productivity.
